channel.title: Anselmo L. S. Melo's Git Achievements

item.title: Investigator (Level 5)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 12)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Thug (Level 9)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Master Merchant (Level 7)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 5)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 8)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Hunter (Level 6)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 9)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Butcher (Level 10)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Pilgrim (Level 6)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Master Goldsmith (Level 7)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 10)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Author (Level 11)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Thug (Level 8)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 10)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Miller (Level 10)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 2549 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 3)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 8)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Garage Inventor
item.description: Used a custom alias for a Git command

item.title: Merchant (Level 6)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.
